roasts.roast: Hey Elon, even your rockets have more personality than your tweets!
Your cars might be electric, but your sense of humor is completely drained.
Maybe if you put as much energy into jokes as you do into rockets, you'd actually land one.
Elon, you're so high-tech, yet your humor is completely outdated.
You might be able to colonize Mars, but you can't seem to colonize a decent punchline.
Your business ventures may be ambitious, but your comedy is still in beta.
Who needs rocket science when you could at least launch a proper zinger?
I’d say your tweets are a space odyssey, but at least space has more gravitas.
Your vision for the future is as confusing as your jokes are flat.
Keep reaching for the stars, Elon—maybe one day you'll find some humor up there.
